events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection yesterday afternoon.
The claim was categorised as an Auto Accident based on mention of vehicle collision and damages.
An agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim to ensure timely support.
Acknowledgment sent to the customer confirming receipt and initiation of processing for the accident claim.
Customer was asked to provide police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates for the accident.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report, photos, and mechanic's assessment.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and accident circumstances for claim validation.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the collision was at-fault on the other driver’s side.
Settlement offer proposed to customer covering full vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses.
Customer responded with gratitude for the prompt service and accepted the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for vehicle repairs and related expenses was processed and issued to the customer’s bank account.
The customer's auto accident claim was officially closed after successful payment and case resolution.
